description: Built multi-dimension lesson quality scanner and auto-fixer. Scans 6 dimensions: metadata completeness, broken citations, format consistency, near-duplicates, stale references, orphan citations. Auto-fixes safe issues (adding Cites: headers from body references).

meta.note: Most missing metadata is in early lessons (L-001-200) — Session/Domain/Cites fields not yet standardized

citations.note: 7 truly broken citations (non-existent L-NNN) + 5 range notation false positives (fixed in tool)

format.note: Missing ## Finding or ## Rule sections — format evolved across 3 eras

duplicates.note: Top pair: L-555/L-556 at Jaccard 0.806. 20 pairs above 0.4 threshold

stale.note: Citations to archived lessons — low priority, archives still accessible

orphans.note: 177 lessons had L-NNN references in body but no Cites: header — all fixed

interpretation: Lesson corpus has 3 quality eras: early (L-001-100, minimal metadata), middle (L-100-400, partial metadata), modern (L-400+, structured headers). The biggest auto-fixable gap was orphan citations — lessons reference each other in body text but lack machine-readable Cites: headers. Fixing this increased citation header coverage from 20% to 52%, making the NK citation network more visible to automated tools. Remaining gaps (Session, Domain, ISO, Sharpe) require per-lesson semantic judgment and cannot be safely auto-fixed.
